system.effect: A Vessel with this can attempt to mine gas giants for plasma. Make +0 Pilot (Space Craft)+Maneuvrability Test, failiure causes 1d5 damage per DoF, ignoring shields. Success grants a months worth of fuel and +5 Achievement Points towards Endeavours requiring transporting or moving something. One per Vessel. Grand Cruisers cannot use this component.
